column4: ï»¿hi guys... i constantly find that the audio in my Hardy stops .... then when i TEST the sound settings i get this error >>>>audiotestsrc wave=sine freq=512 ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! gconfaudiosink: Could not open audio device for playback. intrepid is not ready for release. Wait until 30th October if you don't have the time (or ability) to solve much bigger problems than sound
